gurmukhi: ijsu qU dyih iqsY ikAw cwrw ]

english: There, in the fire of the mother's womb, You protected us.

roman: bhaujal bikham asagaahu gur sabadhee paar paeh ||

gurmukhi: ijn kau lgI ipAws AMimRqu syie Kwih ]

english: Those who feel thirst for You, take in Your Ambrosial Nectar.

roman: kal meh eho pu(n)n gun govi(n)dh gaeh ||
english: This is the only act of goodness in this Dark Age of Kali Yuga, to sing the Glorious Praises of the Lord of the Universe.

gurmukhi: sBsY no ikrpwlu sm@wly swih swih ]
roman: sabhasai no kirapaal sam(h)aale saeh saeh ||
english: He is Merciful to all; He sustains us with each and every breath.

gurmukhi: ibrQw koie n jwie ij AwvY quDu Awih ]9]
roman: birathaa koi na jai j aavai tudh aaeh ||9||
english: Those who come to You with love and faith are never turned away empty-handed. ||9||

english: Shalok, Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: AMqir guru AwrwDxw ijhvw jip gur nwau ]
roman: a(n)tar gur aaraadhanaa jihavaa jap gur naau ||
english: Deep within yourself, worship the Guru in adoration, and with your tongue, chant the Guru's Name.

gurmukhi: nyqRI siqguru pyKxw sRvxI sunxw gur nwau ]
roman: netree satigur pekhanaa sravanee sunanaa gur naau ||
english: Let your eyes behold the True Guru, and let your ears hear the Guru's Name.

gurmukhi: siqgur syqI riqAw drgh pweIAY Twau ]
roman: satigur setee ratiaa dharageh paieeaai Thaau ||
english: Attuned to the True Guru, you shall receive a place of honor in the Court of the Lord.

gurmukhi: khu nwnk ikrpw kry ijs no eyh vQu dyie ]
roman: kahu naanak kirapaa kare jis no eh vath dhei ||
english: Says Nanak, this treasure is bestowed on those who are blessed with His Mercy.

gurmukhi: jg mih auqm kwFIAih ivrly kyeI kyie ]1]
roman: jag meh utam kaadde'eeh virale keiee kei ||1||
english: In the midst of the world, they are known as the most pious - they are rare indeed. ||1||

gurmukhi: mÚ 5 ]
roman: mahalaa panjavaa ||
english: Fifth Mehla:

gurmukhi: rKy rKxhwir Awip aubwirAnu ]
roman: rakhe rakhanahaar aap ubaarian ||
english: O Savior Lord, save us and take us across.

gurmukhi: gur kI pYrI pwie kwj svwirAnu ]
roman: gur kee pairee pai kaaj savaarian ||
english: Falling at the feet of the Guru, our works are embellished with perfection.

gurmukhi: hoAw Awip dieAwlu mnhu n ivswirAnu ]
roman: hoaa aap dhiaal manahu na visaarian ||
english: You have become kind, merciful and compassionate; we do not forget You from our minds.

gurmukhi: swD jnw kY sMig Bvjlu qwirAnu ]
roman: saadh janaa kai sa(n)g bhavajal taarian ||
english: In the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, we are carried across the terrifying world-ocean.

gurmukhi: swkq inMdk dust iKn mwih ibdwirAnu ]
roman: saakat ni(n)dhak dhusaT khin maeh bidhaarian ||
english: In an instant, You have destroyed the faithless cynics and slanderous enemies.

gurmukhi: iqsu swihb kI tyk nwnk mnY mwih ]
roman: tis saahib kee Tek naanak manai maeh ||
english: That Lord and Master is my Anchor and Support; O Nanak, hold firm in your mind.

gurmukhi: ijsu ismrq suKu hoie sgly dUK jwih ]2]
roman: jis simarat sukh hoi sagale dhookh jaeh ||2||
english: Remembering Him in meditation, happiness comes, and all sorrows and pains simply vanish. ||2||
